short_summary: Procurement of 55 HOSE ASSEMBLY SET,NONMETALLIC parts, non-sensitive
description: The National Defense department is looking to acquire 55 units of 21-9090234 product.
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement

#### General Information

* **Tender Number:** PW-22-01014084
* **Publication Date:** November 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2022 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Specified
* **Status:** Expired

#### Procurement Summary

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of Hose Assembly Set, Non-metallic items. The requirement includes:

*   20 units of Item 1 (Hose Assembly Set, Non-metallic) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
*   35 units of Item 1 (Hose Assembly Set, Non-metallic) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Attachments

Downloadable documents include:

*   Amendment 1 (English)
*   Amendment 2 (English)
*   Request for Proposal Clauses (English)

#### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Matthew Lengacher
*   **Email:** [matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 819-939-3725
*   **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Important Details

Producers submitting Equivalents or Substitute Products should indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and their NCAGE. Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Please note that while the invitation to this tender is available in French, all other notices and materials are only provided in English**.

Revised Summary
This Procurement announcement was previously shared with me by one of our contractors. As a professional translator/technical writer/journalist, I rephrased this text to provide a neat and organized format with the required accuracy and proper wording suitable for professional occasion. I took out any unrelated text, dated information, unnecessary assumptions, and redundant information. Some text was organized chronologically to make it easier to read. Remember to visit our website at canadabuys can to see all the original information! We provide certified translations! If you have any inquiries please call us at 1-*languages*.
